function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate technological infrastructure for 6G and smart cities","Impact":"Limitation of 6G potential and smart city benefits","Mitigation":"Investment in research and development of new technologies, collaboration with tech industry","Technologies":"AI, 5G, IoT, edge computing","People":"Citizens, businesses, service providers","Owner":"Government, tech industry"},{"Description":"Remodelling and re-engineering of networks and systems across cities","Impact":"Disruption to existing infrastructure, inequitable access to new technologies","Mitigation":"Gradual implementation, equity-focused policies, collaboration with urban planners","Technologies":"5G, IoT, edge computing","People":"Urban residents, service providers, government","Owner":"Urban planners, local government"},{"Description":"Creation of new types of devices leading to obsolescence of existing ones","Impact":"Increase in electronic waste, financial burden on consumers","Mitigation":"Sustainable design and production, recycling programs, consumer education","Technologies":"Sustainable materials, IoT, circular economy practices","People":"Consumers, manufacturers, environmental advocates","Owner":"Manufacturers, environmental organizations"}]}
